comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do not edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: v_cosine
description: Calculates the cosine similarity between two dense_vectors.

params.name: left
params.description: first dense_vector to calculate cosine similarity

params.name: right
params.description: second dense_vector to calculate cosine similarity

examples:
from colors
| where color != "black"
| eval similarity = v_cosine(rgb_vector, [0, 255, 255])
| sort similarity desc, color asc
